p: In addition to the determination of metals, in many cases coumarin derivatives are used as fluorescence probes for the detection of hypochlorite, as in the case of coumarin–thiophene complexes ( Figure 8, compound XLVI) [ 70] or of 2-thiocoumarins in which the presence of ClO– allows the formation of a fluorescent coumarin ( Figure 8, compound XLVII) [ 71].
